"Lurker in the Forest":
"That Forest is seriously messed up.
You've got to bail me out here...
I was ordered to check the Forest out,
right, so I went there to take a look.
Then this massive Rockbear showed
up, so I got out of there in a hurry and
told ARKS it was too hot to handle.
But we can't just leave it there, right?
I reckon you're made of stronger stuff
than me, killer. See if you can shift it."
